title: manipal cse vs pes ec cse
content: pes ec 1lpa, manipal 5lpa and I prefer academics over campus life tbh

comments.body: So you think manipal won't offer anything in terms of academic and Placements? Still I would suggest pes cse.
pes ec
if you prefer academics over campus life then PES ec, the campus life will SUCK but the plcements will be the best you can get
CSE vs ECE those are different battle fields, check out the sub for similar questions, youâ€™ll find plenty of answers.
not ece, both are cse only
My bad sorry, then choose PES EC is academics if your only goal, youâ€™ll end up saving lot of money in the process as well.
but placements wise which is a better choice?

If you are ready to slog forgoing college life PES will be the obvious choice.
Competition is pretty high in PES with around 3-4K CSE students.

And if you have financial constraints , kcet seat is a no Brainer as you'll be save up for masters /mba
oh it'd noy like I can't afford mit, but like the saved money will surely help

It is actually 288 + 288 + 192 + 96 = 864. They took in 360 + 360 + 264 + 132 during round 1 counselling coz they knew a lot of students would be surrendering their seats as the other counsellings began. The following is the seat matrix.

[https://pes.edu/intake-of-courses/](https://pes.edu/intake-of-courses/)

manipal has the best mix of campus life and academics, as far as I've seen even the syllabuses of both the unis are pretty up to date. If money isn't an issue and you want stories to tell about your college life then go to manipal. If money is an issue and you want to only study and cram for 4 years then go to pes ecc
